scripts.build:all: npm run build --prefix frontend && echo "Backend: Node.js (sin compilacion requerida)"
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.deploy:frontend: npm run build --prefix frontend && sudo rm -rf /var/www/micitamedica/frontend/dist/* && sudo cp -r frontend/dist/* /var/www/micitamedica/frontend/dist/ && sudo chown -R www-data:www-data /var/www/micitamedica/frontend/dist && sudo systemctl reload nginx
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:frontend && npm run deploy:backend
